meaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>fingers</radical> and dig the <radical>tree</radical> bits out of this <radical>cleat</radical> to <kanji>gather</kanji> it into evidence. Gather it in a pile or a bag, just make sure it's all in one place so you can take a closer look later.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>gather</kanji> them all together and realize there are <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい) parts mixed in with the tree bits. Uh oh, it's as you feared. Your cyborg definitely got into trouble somewhere around here and you walked all over it with your cleats.
